messages.ssml:
<speak>
  In order to closely replicate the workplace experience in a class,BMU has adopted an 'outside-in' approach to curricula planning and design.
  <break time ="500ms"/>
  It has integrated basic academia concepts with industy's real needs and challenges faced by the world at large.
</speak>
messages.displayText: In order to closely replicate the workplace experience in a class,BMU has adopted an 'outside-in' approach to curricula planning and design.
